author: gdamour
msg: The previous attempt to fix the mod_jk integration had a limitation whereby the actual session Id, i.e. the value returned by HttpSession.getId(), was not including the jvmRoute. As a consequence, session stickiness was not properly working when the session Id was encoded in URLs, i.e. when cookies were turned off.
Integration tests with mod_jk have been conducted.
This fixes GERONIMO-4626 - Tomcat Clustering with WADI - JSESSIONID with jvmRoute to support mod_jk routing

author: amaniatis
msg: CAY-1167 Atttractive end user documentation for the schema.
I am unsure if this is the appropriate place to put these files, so I'm open to other alternatives.
It makes sense that they belong with the actual schema documents, but perhaps they should be excluded from building into the jar.
